class.name: OpenTelemetryTracerProvider
class.brief_description: Factory for creating tracers in distributed tracing.
class.description: OpenTelemetryTracerProvider is the entry point for creating tracers. It manages a collection of tracers and provides resource attributes that are shared across all spans created by its tracers. Resource attributes typically describe the service, deployment environment, and other contextual information.

method.name: get_resource_attributes
method.description: Returns the resource attributes shared by all tracers from this provider.

method.name: get_tracer
method.description: Gets or creates a tracer with the specified instrumentation scope. Returns the same tracer instance for identical name/version/schema combinations.

method.name: set_resource_attributes
method.description: Sets resource attributes that describe the service (e.g., service.name, deployment.environment).
